narratives.evidence_quote: रूस शीत युद्ध की लौ जलाने के लिए अमेरिकी-प्रभुत्व वाले सैन्य गठबंधन का परीक्षण करता रहा.
narratives.reasoning: This statement portrays the Western alliance (the United States-led NATO) as provocative and manipulative, framing Western powers as driving force behind conflict rather than Russia directly, thus discrediting the West and its diplomacy.

narratives.narrative_name: URW: Blaming the war on others rather than the invader
narratives.evidence_quote: यही कारण है कि नाटो ने यूक्रेन-रूस संकट में हस्तक्षेप किया है.
narratives.reasoning: The sentence links NATO’s actions to the Ukraine-Russia crisis, shifting some responsibility away from Russia’s invasion toward Western actions, which aligns with blaming others for the war.

subnarratives.subnarrative_name: URW: Discrediting the West, Diplomacy: The EU is divided
subnarratives.evidence_quote: लेकिन जर्मनी और फ्रांस ने इस कदम को रोक दिया.
subnarratives.reasoning: This shows disagreement among Western European powers regarding Ukraine's NATO membership, suggesting the EU is divided.

subnarratives.subnarrative_name: URW: Discrediting the West, Diplomacy: Diplomacy does/will not work
subnarratives.evidence_quote: ऐसा सिद्धांत नाटो को रूस या चीन के वीटो पर निर्भर बना देता, इसलिए यह विचार खारिज कर दिया गया था. यही कारण है कि नाटो ने यूक्रेन के रूसी युद्ध से लड़ने का फैसला किया है.
subnarratives.reasoning: The text discusses a diplomatic principle that would require UNSC authorization; it was rejected because it would be vetoed by Russia/China, leading NATO to engage militarily, implying diplomacy would not work in this case.

subnarratives.subnarrative_name: URW: Discrediting the West, Diplomacy: Other
subnarratives.evidence_quote: रूस शीत युद्ध की लौ जलाने के लिए अमेरिकी-प्रभुत्व वाले सैन्य गठबंधन का परीक्षण करता रहा.
subnarratives.reasoning: This line portrays the Western alliance as explicitly dominated by the United States, an angle that supports the parent narrative without fitting the other specific subnarratives.

subnarratives.subnarrative_name: URW: Blaming the war on others rather than the invader: The West are the aggressors
subnarratives.evidence_quote: नाटो की ओर से भी जंग की घोषणा कर गई है.
subnarratives.reasoning: The text attributes the escalation of war to NATO (the Western bloc) by stating that NATO has declared war, signaling Western involvement and shifting responsibility for the conflict away from Russia (the invader) toward the West.
